preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 20 g of Aluminum Oxide, 10 g of Potassium Carbonate, 15 g of Lithium Carbonate, and 5 g of Silica using a precision scale. 
 2. In a mixing bowl, combine all measured materials uniformly. 
 3. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture into a fine powder to ensure homogeneity.
